last_episode_to_air.name: Yumyulack's Giant Head
last_episode_to_air.overview: Yumyulack finds out some unsavory news about his mission role.

name: Solar Opposites
overview: A family of aliens from a much better world must take refuge in middle America after the destruction of their planet. Their mission: protect the Pupa, a living super computer that will one day evolve into its true form, consume them and terraform the Earth.

production_companies.name: Justin Roiland's Solo Vanity Card Productions

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: In season 5, now that alien mission partners Terry and Korvo are married, the whole Solar Opposites team are focused on family values.

tagline: Buckle up for another crazy ride.

episodes.name: The Matter Transfer Array
episodes.overview: Uh oh! Korvo and Terry make a Funbucket real while the replicants deal with a school bully.

episodes.name: The Unstable Grey Hole
episodes.overview: Yikes! Korvo and Terry use alien technology to make their neighbors like them. Jesse tries to show Yumyulack that humans are basically good.

episodes.name: The Quantum Ring
episodes.overview: TaDAH! Korvo becomes a magician!

episodes.name: The Booster Manifold
episodes.overview: Egad! Korvo and Terry try to manage their stress. The replicants learn about their growing bodies.

episodes.name: The Lavatic Reactor
episodes.overview: YAKKITY YACK! TERRY AND KORVO ARE GOING TO SCHOOL! Jesse and Yumyulack *also* go to school.

episodes.name: The P.A.T.R.I.C.I.A. Device
episodes.overview: G'day! This episode is all about Yumyulack and koalas!

episodes.name: Terry and Korvo Steal a Bear
episodes.overview: Whoops! Terry, Korvo, Yumyulack and Jesse work together to steal a bear from the zooâ€¦ with hilarious consequences.

episodes.name: Retrace-Your-Step-Alizer
episodes.overview: Finally! It's season finale time, baby!

episodes.name: The Sacred Non-Repeating Number
episodes.overview: Blimey! The Solar Opposites have repaired their ship and are heading to space, unless something goes hilariously wrong...

episodes.name: The Earth Eraser
episodes.overview: Heyo! Terry's obsession with dinner parties gets the whole team in a mess-o-trouble.

episodes.name: The Lake House Device
episodes.overview: Far out! Korvo and Terry manipulate each other with time travel while Yumyulack grows a fat hog.

episodes.name: The Emergency Urbanizer
episodes.overview: Woohoo! School's out, so the Solars make a splash at summer camp!

episodes.name: The Rad Awesome Terrific Ray
episodes.overview: Oh no! The Red Goobler's back and this time he's jacked! This one's too scary for me.

episodes.name: The Apple Pencil Pro
episodes.overview: Dinner Time! Korvo wins top prize at the annual neighborhood rib festival.

episodes.name: The Unlikely Demise of Terry's Favorite Shot Glass
episodes.overview: Oops! The wild story that explains why Terry had to order a new shot glass.

episodes.name: The Solar Opposites Almost Get an Xbox
episodes.overview: Finally! It's season finale time again! The Solars learn about death!

episodes.name: The Extremity Triangulator
episodes.overview: Welcome back! The Solar Opposites have repaired their ship again and are finally heading to space. No way things go wrong this time!

episodes.name: Edamame Duffle Bag
episodes.overview: Choo choo! Korvo goes full steam ahead with his model train hobby.

episodes.name: The Pupa's Big Day
episodes.overview: Get in line! This episode is outSTANDing.

episodes.name: Hululand
episodes.overview: Buckle up! The Solars go to Hululand!

episodes.name: The Gargoyle Ray
episodes.overview: Oops! Terry and Korvo get taken away by Child Protective Services!

episodes.name: 99 Ships
episodes.overview: WHAT HAPPENED TO ALL THE SHIPS FROM THE OPENING CREDITS?!

episodes.name: The Platinum Beyblade Burst 800 Takara Tomy Edition
episodes.overview: Jackpot! Yumyulack learns about high school betting.

episodes.name: The Cubic Lattice Crystallizer
episodes.overview: Pack your bags: the Solar Opposites are going on vacation!

episodes.name: The Rays That Turn People Into Various Things
episodes.overview: Congratulations! The Solars live in an award-winning town!

episodes.name: Terry and Korvo Get in a Big Screaming Fight in the Taco Bell Parking Lot
episodes.overview: Freeze! Assume the position and prepare for justice!

episodes.name: The Fog of Pupa
episodes.overview: Finally, another season finale! Just wish the Pupa would behave himself...

episodes.name: The Ping Pong Table
episodes.overview: At their new jobs, Korvo and Terry lobby their boss to get the office a ping pong table.

episodes.name: The Earth Rake (beta)
episodes.overview: Fearing Terry will blow a big client opportunity, Korvo crashes his business trip in the Wooden City.

episodes.name: The Mobile AISHA Emitter
episodes.overview: AISHA goes on a date outside the ship.

episodes.name: The Pronunciation Cassette Tapes
episodes.overview: The Solars get a pet dinosaur!

episodes.name: The Birth-A-Day Present
episodes.overview: Itâ€™s Yumyulackâ€™s birthday!

episodes.name: The Stockiverse Ray
episodes.overview: The Solars get trapped in the Stock Image-filled Stockiverse.

episodes.name: The Cardboard Dead Drop
episodes.overview: An action filled, espionage action episode that takes place in the wall.

episodes.name: The Super Gooblers
episodes.overview: The Solars all create Super Gooblers which are living versions of their own emotional problems.

episodes.name: Down and Out on Planet X-Non
episodes.overview: Glen has to learn to survive in an alien city.

episodes.name: The Re-Visibility Bouillabaisse
episodes.overview: Korvo and Terry accidentally turn themselves invisible and the invisibility makes them blind.

episodes.name: The Unwanted Personification of Terry
episodes.overview: The Solars have been on Earth long enough that theyâ€™re starting to become human!

episodes.name: The Clervixian Dinner Helmets
episodes.overview: The Solars try getting approved for permanent residency on their new home planet: Clervix 3.

episodes.name: The Never-ending Honeymoon Story
episodes.overview: Korvo and Terry celebrate their honeymoon.

episodes.name: Live Die Repeat Device (Formerly known as the Edge of Tomorrow Device)
episodes.overview: Korvo uses a device to keep reliving the same day, so he can impress a guy who works at the hardware store.

episodes.name: The Educational Sprinkler Device
episodes.overview: Terry and Korvo open a private school.

episodes.name: Ex-Boyfriend Island
episodes.overview: Jesse's ex-boyfriends come back to haunt the Solars.

episodes.name: The Sci-Fi Rollerblades
episodes.overview: Korvo gets his ass kicked by a dad at Jesse and Yumyulack's school.

episodes.name: The Solar Opposites Do an Intervention
episodes.overview: The gang comes together to expose hard truths to one of their celebrity friends.

episodes.name: The What If?! Device
episodes.overview: The Solars have a What If?! Device which can show them what their lives would be like if they made different choices.

episodes.name: The Battle of Zab 9
episodes.overview: The Silvercops go to war.

episodes.name: Terry's Big Cleaning Day
episodes.overview: For the small people shrunk down by Yumyulack, an adventure awaits in the back yard!

episodes.name: Yumyulack's Giant Head
episodes.overview: Yumyulack finds out some unsavory news about his mission role.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: In season 5, now that alien mission partners Terry and Korvo are married, the whole Solar Opposites team are focused on family values.
